title: Appointy Privacy Policy - Online scheduling software
content:
Last updated on: July, 2023

For the prior version, please click here

PURPOSE

  • Appointy Software Inc. and its Subsidiaries and Affiliates (“Appointy,” “we,” “us,” “our,”) are committed to protecting the privacy of individuals who visit the Appointy Sites (“Visitors”) and individuals who register to use the Services (“Businesses” and “End Users”). This Privacy Policy (“Policy”) describes Appointy privacy practices in relation to the use of the Appointy Sites and the related applications, services, and programs offered by Appointy (collectively, the “Services”), as well as individuals’ choices regarding use, access and correction of personal information.
  • Definitions used in this Policy: The definitions and terms defined in the Business Terms of Service and End User Agreement are incorporated in this Agreement by reference.

Copyright 2020 © Appointy. All rights reserved
